âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Drastically reduced memory usage (up to 10x) â€¢ Full compatibility with Prometheus (configuration files, API endpoints, storage block format) â€¢ Effortless migration (drop-in replacement)
ðŸ“– Summary: Prom++ is a high-performance fork of Prometheus designed to significantly reduce memory consumption. It achieves this by rewriting resource-intensive components in C++, specifically in-memory block construction and Write-Ahead Log (WAL) management. Prom++ is a drop-in replacement for Prometheus, ensuring effortless migration and full compatibility with existing configurations and data.
